title: Preview attached file in PDF shows missing page break in the first item
description: Description: When previewing the attached file in PDF format, the page break in the first item is not displayed correctly.
OB: Currently, when previewing the attached file in PDF format, the page break in the first item is not being shown.
EB: The expected behavior is that the page break in the first item should be visible when previewing the attached file in PDF format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the attached file mentioned in bug 1228982.
2. Preview the file in PDF format.
